transcripts.text: Here's my epistemic justice person coming.  How are you?  Good.  Setting the timer.  I beg your pardon?  I said setting the timer.  Only if you have time to talk.  Okay, it's got four minutes.  Four minutes?  Are you going to hold me to four?  Because it's such a complicated topic.  It is.  These are four-minute segments.  I know.  But usually we hit the four minutes and the person wants to keep talking.  Are you okay if I continue to record?  Sure.
